video.title: Mystery Diners
video.synopsis: Aided by hidden surveillance equipment, undercover operatives work with restaurant owners to expose employees whose bad behavior is hurting business.

episodes.synopsis: Diners Destiney and Rob dig up the truth when the owner of 55 Degree Wine and Link n Hops in Los Angeles notices discrepancies at both his businesses.
episodes.title: Employee Discount

episodes.synopsis: Lenny, the owner of Cookin' with Lenny Smokehouse in Los Angeles, contacts Charles Stiles to find out if one of his employees is a catering traitor.
episodes.title: Poaching Profits

episodes.synopsis: The Mystery Diners go undercover at Fenders Moto Cafe and Brew Pub in Portland, Oregon, to find out if employees have stolen motorcycle memorabilia.
episodes.title: Missing Memorabilia

episodes.synopsis: The owners of Dar Salam in Portland, Oregon, suspect that a competing Iraqi food cart is stealing their supplies -- and their recipes.
episodes.title: Robbed Kabobs

episodes.synopsis: In Portland, Oregon, the owner of the high-end Uptown Billiards Club suspects that the social media expert he hired may be pulling a fast one.
episodes.title: Behind the Eight Ball

episodes.synopsis: Charles Stiles sends in his Mystery Diners to figure out who's been stealing donations to Tavern on Main's annual Thanksgiving food drive.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving Thievery

episodes.synopsis: When the new manager of a food cart pod in Portland, Oregon, draws complaints from tenants, the owners call on Charles Stiles to investigate.
episodes.title: Food Cart Catastrophe

episodes.synopsis: The owners of Amalfi's restaurant in Portland, Oregon, suspect their staff is going a bit overboard making promotional videos for the popular eatery.
episodes.title: Local Celebrities

episodes.synopsis: Charles sends in the Mystery Diners to help the owner of Rock Island Cafe in Honolulu figure out what's behind a recent drop in memorabilia sales.
episodes.title: Memorabilia Mayhem

episodes.synopsis: Charles Stiles steps in when the owner of Cha Cha Cha Salsaria in Honolulu hears rumors about employees operating an unauthorized delivery service.
episodes.title: Deep Sea Delivery

episodes.synopsis: When the general manager of the Hawaii Yacht Club learns that nonmembers have been attending members-only events, she asks Charles to investigate.
episodes.title: Hawaiian Club Crashers

episodes.synopsis: When the owner of ShoreFyre in Honolulu notices that something's amiss with sales, two Mystery Diners discover a link to a neighboring surf shop.
episodes.title: Fyre on the Beach

episodes.synopsis: Charles Stiles helps the owner of Honolulu's Chef Chai get to the bottom of things when multiple ticket voids keep turning up during service.
episodes.title: Bad Credit
